post:
Welcome to UptimeVPS Sales.

UptimeVPS Believes in maximum uptime for its customers. We use state of the art hardware and pride ourselves on having the best uptime around.

All hostnodes are all multicore with very high specifications.

All support is brought to you but numerous members of staff which years of experience.

Our nodes support both x86 templates and x86_64 offering you a great choice of variety depending on your requirments.

Currently we are offering a once in a life time offer. €9 Euros/Yr for a 384MB VPS Server with OpenVZ Virtualiaztion.

We pride our selves on a no over selling policy. All nodes are of a simular specification as below.

The nodes:

AMD 6 Core Processor
32GB DDR3 Memory
2x 2TB Hard disk drives.
1GBPS Connection.

Some nodes are of a lower specification but benefit from an I7 processor with a minimum of 24GBs of memory.
